column3: naaso obiara mmfa nnto n'akoma mu; wɔfa Nyamesuronyi kɔ
column4: ber a obiara nntse ase. Mbusu a ɔreba no ho na woeyi ɔtseneneenyi efi
column6: "ɔkɛhɛn asomdwee mu; wɔhom wɔ hɔn mpa do
column7: obiara a ɔnantsew no tɔɔtsenyɛ mu no."

column2: "Woana na hom kyerɛ hom ho wɔ no do yi? Woana na hom hanhan hom anomu
column3: na hom worɔworɔw tɛkyerɛma wɔ no do yi? Aso hom nnyɛ mbrato mba
column6: "hom a hom bɔ hom ho hyew wɔ nsudur mu
column7: wɔ dua ebun ebun ase; hom a hom kuku mboframba wɔ mbɔnsa no mu
column8: wɔ abotan no ne mpaapaae no ase?"

column2: "Mbɔnsa no mu abo tortor no mu na wo kyɛfa wɔ; hɔn
column3: hɔnara nye w'afamudze: hɔnara mpo so na ehue ehuensa egu hɔn do
column4: na abɔ hɔn edziban afɔr. Aso mo bo bɔdwe wɔ iyinom ho?"

column2: "Bepɔw sorɔnsorɔm a ɔkrɔn etsifi na akɔtow wo kɛtɛ: hɔ ara so na efowee kɔree kɔbɔɔ okum afɔr."
"Na mbobow na apondua ekyir na edze wo nkaadze esi: na apa m'ekyir
column4: na afow kɔ; ɔwo atserɛw wo kɛtɛ mu
column5: na enye hɔn edzi ahyɛmu; epɛɛ hɔn kɛtɛ no wɔ mbrɛ ihunii no."

column2: "Na edze seradze sii mu kɔr ɔhen ne nkyɛn
column5: na etoo woho adze ara kɔr samanadze mpo."

column2: "Wo kwan ne tsentsen maa eberɛe; naaso annka dɛ
column3: Enyidado nnyi hɔ: inyaa w'ahoɔdzen no nkwa; dɛm ntsi na anntɔ bitsi."

column2: "Na woana na w'akoma etu no ho na esuro no
column5: eso anndwen mo ho yi? Ana ommfir tsetse na maka m'ano ato mu komm

column2: "Mebɛka wo tsenenee na wo ndwuma akyerɛ; naaso ɔrennyɛ wo mfaso bi."

column3: ma w'abosom a aprapra hɔn aboa ano no wɔngye wo; na mframa bɛfa hɔn akɔ
column4: ehuw bɔsoa hɔn nyinara akɔ: na nyia ɔdze no werɛ twer me no
column6: na oenya me bepɔw krɔnkrɔn no atsena do."
hom nyiyi mfintsidua no wɔ me man hɔn kwan mu."

column2: "Na mbrɛ nyia ɔkrɔn na ɔyɛ abɔso a ɔtse onnyiewiei mu
column3: na ne dzin nye Krɔnkrɔn no ɔse nye yi: Metse bea a ɔkrɔn na ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn do
column4: wɔ nyia no sunsum abobɔ na abrɛ adze nkyɛn so
column6: na mahwɛ hɔn a hɔn akoma abobɔ nkwa."

column3: eso mo bo rummfuw daa: nkyɛ sunsum na akra a mara mayɛ no

column2: "N'enyiber emumuyɛ ntsi na mo bo fuwii na mobɔɔ no
column3: muhuntsaa m'enyim na mo bo fuwii: naaso ɔdaa ho ara nantseew akɔnkyew mu wɔ n'akoma no kwan mu."
naaso mebɛsa no yarba: mibegya no kwan so
column5: na medze nsɛm a ɔyɛ dɛw ahyɛ no nkɔmbɔdzifo ano."

column4: nka nyia ɔwɔ ekyirekyir na nyia ɔbɛn
column5: EWURADZE na ɔse; na mebɛsa no yarba."

column2: "Naaso emumuyɛfo tse dɛ po a ɔapram; osiandɛ ɔda a ɔnnda
column3: na n'esu puw dɛtsebir na nwura gu."
